title: Nerf Fizz HOly CHRIST
body: 2 dorans rings and the fish one shots me, RIOT what the fuck are you doing? This is absolute garbage. No champ is complained about more or tilts people more or is more unhealthy than this fuck.

replies.body:
Sure, let's nerf a champion that's already in a bad spot without an extremely high amount of experience on him because someone is crying because they don't know how to play against him.

mmk.

Edit: OP appears to play only bot games. I can only imagine this is a troll post, or just an unspeakably awful player. Probably troll.

I can promise fizz did not oneshot you from full hp with two dorans rings, as that is mathematically impossible.

More accurately, you stayed in lane with low HP to taunt him, he flashed, ignited and unloaded his kit on your face, and you died to the %missingHP damage and ignite.

Tl;DR dont make dumb plays, press B.
